uniol.apt.util.equations

Class InequalitySystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<InequalitySystem.Inequality>
      • uniol.apt.util.equations.InequalitySystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<InequalitySystem.Inequality>, java.util.Collection<InequalitySystem.Inequality>

    public class InequalitySystem
extends java.util.AbstractCollection<InequalitySystem.Inequality>
    Representation of an inequality system.
    Author:
    Uli Schlachter

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  InequalitySystem.Comparator
      An enumeration of comparators on numbers.
      static class  InequalitySystem.Inequality
      Instances of this class represent a linear inequality in a number of unknowns.
